column4: Is there any easy way which does not include booting to a live cd that would recover some jpeg files i've deleted from my recycle bin?
there's no easy way to recover files period
I'm not aware of any real way to recover.  Also... BLASPHEMER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Windows and Linux ARE NOT THE SAME, NOR ARE THEY REMOTELY SIMILAR!!!
